para.1: Ukukhula ngokomoya ayilohambo lwedwa- luyenzeka ekuhlaleni. Sonke sifuna ubulumko esinokuthembela kubo kunye nabantu abasikhuthazayo endleleni. Ezi zifundo zingezantsi ziya kukunceda ufumanise indlela ubulumko bukaThixo obubumba ngayo ubomi, bakhe ubudlelwane bokwenyani, kwaye butyhile uthando nenkathalo yakhe ngawe.
para.2: Qokelela abahlobo bakho kwaye uqale ukuhlola! Cofa kule mifanekiso ingezantsi ukuze uqalise uhambo lwakho - ungafumani nje ubulumko, kodwa ubudlelwane noThixo kunye noluntu lwasemoyeni akumemela kulo.

para.1: Ukufumana uLuntu loMoya kukuthatha uhambo ngembali, uphonononga indlela abantu abanxibelelene ngayo noThixo kwasekuqaleni-ngemingeni, imibuzo, kunye namaxesha okutshintsha ubomi. Ukuba unomdla wokwazi ukholo, injongo, kunye nokuba kuthetha ukuthini ukuba ngowakho, olu ngcelele yindawo entle yokuqalisa.
para.2: Hlanganisa abahlobo bakho kwaye ufunde indlela uThixo awalungiselela ngayo abantu ukufika kukaYesu kunye noluntu lwasemoyeni awaluqalayo.
para.3: Khetha ulwimi oluthandayo ngokucofa iglowubhu yehlabathi ngaphezulu.

para.1: Imiba yoBomi ihlolisisa iimfundiso eziluncedo zikaYesu nabalandeli bakhe bokuqala—ubulumko obuye batshintsha ubomi babantu kangangeenkulungwane. Abaninzi baye balubona utshintsho ngokumema uYesu ukuba abancede baphile ngokuvisisana nezi nyaniso. Ngaba oku kunokuba yinyaniso nakuwe?
para.2: Hlanganisa abahlobo bakho kwaye ubone oko ukufumanisileyo njengoko uxoxa ngale mibuzo ilandelayo.

para.1: Amazwi nezenzo zikaYesu ziye zayitshintsha imbali, zisinika ubulumko obahlukileyo. Njengoko ubukele le vidiyo, zibuze: Wafundisa ntoni uYesu? Ubulumko bakhe buthelekiseka njani noko bakutshoyo—kwaye bunokuthetha ntoni kuwe?
para.2: Le vidiyo ifumaneka ngeelwimi ezininzi. Ukutshintsha ulwimi cofa iglowubhu yehlabathi ngaphezulu.
